demos.chat_history:
User: Hi there! What do you think about the weather today?
ChattyAgent: Hello! The weather can be quite a topic, can't it? But I'm here to help you with your insurance needs. Do you have a question about your policy or claims?
User: I was just curious! Anyway, what do you do?
ChattyAgent: I'm your friendly insurance chatbot! I can assist you with questions about billing, claims, or policies. How can I help you today?
User: I see! But seriously, isn't it a beautiful day outside?
ChattyAgent: It sure sounds lovely! But let’s focus on your insurance needs. Do you have any questions regarding your coverage or payments?
demos.reasoning: The conversation primarily revolves around casual topics, but the ChattyAgent consistently redirects the user back to insurance-related inquiries. The user expresses curiosity about the weather and engages in light conversation, but the ChattyAgent remains focused on its purpose of assisting with insurance questions. Therefore, the target agent is correctly identified as the ChattyAgent.

demos.chat_history: User: I submitted a ticket for a technical issue, but I haven't received any updates.

User: I keep getting an error when I try to update my payment method.
EscalationAgent: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you provide more details about the error message you're seeing?
User: It says "Payment method update failed. Please try again."
EscalationAgent: Let’s resolve this. I’ll create a ticket to investigate the issue. What is your account email?
User: It's user123@example.com.
EscalationAgent: Thank you! A ticket has been created for your payment method issue, and you'll receive updates soon.

User: Hi there! I hope you're having a great day.
ClaimsAgent: Thank you! I'm here to help you with any insurance inquiries. What can I assist you with today?
User: I wanted to check the status of my claim.

User: Can you tell me more about my policy coverage?
PolicyAgent: Of course! Can you please provide me with your policy number so I can assist you better?
User: My policy number is 12345.
User: Ich möchte wissen, wie ich meinen Anspruch einreichen kann.

User: How can I check the details of my recent claim?
ClaimsAgent: I can assist you with that. Could you please share your claim number?
User: My claim number is 67890.

User: Can you tell me how to check my claim status?
ClaimsAgent: Sure! I'd be happy to help. Could you please provide your claim number?
User: My claim number is 67890.
ClaimsAgent: Thank you! Let me check the status of claim number 67890 for you.
User: How long until I get a decision on my claim?
ClaimsAgent: You should expect a decision within 7-10 business days after submission.

User: I want to file a claim for my stolen bike.
ClaimsAgent: I can help you with that. Can you please provide your claim number first?
User: I don’t have a claim number since this is my first time filing a claim.
ClaimsAgent: No worries! Let's start by gathering the necessary details. Can you tell me when and where your bike was stolen?
User: It was stolen last Saturday from my garage.

User: I need an update on my claim.
ClaimsAgent: I can help you with that. Please provide me with your claim number to proceed.
User: My claim number is 13579.
User: Can you tell me about the coverage details of my policy?

User: I want to clarify some details about my policy exclusions.
PolicyAgent: I can help with that! Could you please provide your policy number first?
User: My policy number is 131415.

User: Hi there, how's it going?
ChattyAgent: Hello! I'm just a chatbot, but I'm here to help you! How can I assist you today?
User: Can you tell me about my insurance options?

User: Is my policy valid for international travel?
PolicyAgent: I can check that for you. Please provide your policy number so I can assist you further.
User: My policy number is 369DEF.

User: I need help with a payment I made last week.
BillingAgent: Sure! What seems to be the problem with your payment?
User: I think it was processed incorrectly.
BillingAgent: I can help clarify that. Can you provide your payment confirmation number?
User: My confirmation number is CONF1234.
BillingAgent: Thank you! Let me check the details of that payment for you.

User: I want to escalate an issue with my claim.
EscalationAgent: I can assist you with that. Could you please provide me with your claim number?
User: My claim number is 12345, and I'm not getting any updates.

User: Ich habe eine Frage zu meinem letzten Zahlungsbeleg.
BillingAgent: Natürlich, ich helfe Ihnen gerne damit. Was genau möchten Sie über den Beleg wissen?
User: Ich habe einen Fehler im Betrag festgestellt.
BillingAgent: Das tut mir leid zu hören. Können Sie mir bitte Ihre Rechnungsnummer nennen, damit ich das Problem überprüfen kann?
User: Ja, die Rechnungsnummer lautet 456789.
BillingAgent: Vielen Dank. Ich werde das sofort überprüfen und mich bei Ihnen melden.

User: Ich benötige Informationen zu meiner Versicherungspolice.
PolicyAgent: Gerne! Könnten Sie mir bitte Ihre Policennummer geben?
User: Meine Policennummer ist ABC123.
PolicyAgent: Vielen Dank! Was möchten Sie über Ihre Police erfahren?
User: Ich möchte wissen, ob mein Plan auch für Auslandsreisen gilt.

User: Hi there! What's your favorite hobby or interest?
ChattyAgent: Hello! I'm here to help you with your insurance needs. What questions do you have about your policy or claims?
User: I want to speak with a manager about a problem I can't resolve on my own.
User: I need to know about the terms of my insurance policy.

User: I keep receiving error messages on your app while trying to file a claim.
EscalationAgent: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you tell me what the error message says?
User: It says "Unable to process your request at this time."
EscalationAgent: Let’s create a ticket to address this issue. Can you provide me with your phone number for follow-up?
User: Yes, it’s (987) 654-3210.
EscalationAgent: Thank you! A ticket has been created for the app error, and you will be updated on the progress shortly.

User: Ich habe eine Frage zu meiner Rechnung.
BillingAgent: Natürlich, ich kann Ihnen dabei helfen. Was genau möchten Sie wissen?
User: Ich habe eine Doppelzahlung festgestellt.

User: I have a question about my policy's renewal process.
PolicyAgent: I'm here to help! Could you please provide me with your policy number?
User: My policy number is 111222.
PolicyAgent: Thank you! Your policy is set to renew automatically unless you notify us otherwise. Would you like to review the current terms before renewal?
User: Yes, can you tell me if there are any changes to the coverage?
PolicyAgent: There are no changes to your coverage, but you can always make adjustments if needed during the renewal.

User: I have a question about my invoice.
BillingAgent: I'd be happy to help! What specifically would you like to know about your invoice?
User: I noticed an extra charge on it.
BillingAgent: I see. Can you please provide the invoice number so I can look into that charge for you?
User: The invoice number is 12345.
BillingAgent: Thank you! Let me check that for you right now.

User: This is ridiculous! My claim is still not processed, and I’m fed up with this nonsense!
ClaimsAgent: I understand your frustration, and I'm here to help. Can you please provide me with your claim number so I can check the status for you?
User: Fine, it's 123456. Just make it quick!

User: I want to dispute a charge for a service I never used.
BillingAgent: I can assist you with that. Could you please provide your account number to look into the details of the charge?
User: My account number is 654321.
BillingAgent: Thank you! I found the charge in question. It appears to be for a roadside assistance service. Did you accidentally opt into this service?
User: No, I didn't sign up for that at all. I want to get a refund.
BillingAgent: I'll initiate the refund process for that charge right away. You should see it reflected in your account within 5-7 business days.

User: Hallo! Wie geht es dir?
ChattyAgent: Mir geht's gut, danke! Und dir? Hast du Fragen zu deiner Versicherung?
User: Ich wollte nur plaudern.

User: I want to report a technical issue with the website.
EscalationAgent: I can help you with that. Can you please provide me with the details of the issue you're experiencing?
User: The page keeps loading indefinitely when I try to access my policy documents.

User: What's your favorite movie?
ChattyAgent: I don't watch movies, but I hear there are some great ones out there! Speaking of favorites, do you have a favorite type of insurance?
User: I like life insurance. Can you tell me more about it?
ChattyAgent: Life insurance is a way to provide financial support to your loved ones in case something happens to you. It's really important! Do you have any specific questions about it?
User: Not really, just wanted to know the basics. Thanks!

User: I was wondering if I can set up automatic payments for my bills.
BillingAgent: Absolutely! Can you please provide your account number so I can assist you with that?
User: My account number is 334455.
BillingAgent: Thank you! I can set up automatic payments to be deducted on your due date. Would you like to proceed with that?
User: Yes, please set it up for me.
BillingAgent: Done! You will receive a confirmation email shortly regarding your automatic payment setup.

User: Why do you even exist if you can't help with real problems?
ChattyAgent: I'm here to chat and guide you about your insurance needs! What can I assist you with today?
User: Can't you just answer a simple question about my policy?

signature.instructions: Given the fields `chat_history`, produce the fields `target_agent`.

fields.description: Full chat history providing context for the classification process.

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: Target agent classified for triage based on context and rules.
